name: SLT Usage Meter (SLTConsole)
tagline: Sri Lanka Telecom ASDL Usage Meter
body:
###Introduction###
SLT Console is an open source software which can be used to monitor the internet usage of Sri Lanka Telecom Broadband connections.

###Screen Shots###


###Getting Started####
Download and install the setup and you are good to go.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
